Articles.Content: ive heard that after spanner deleted all sm mods (except indistries) that a goo sum of people still have the mod sm marine. If so, can i get a copy? Never really experienced the mod as i never heard of  it until now..
No.  It would violate the license and rule 2.2a, as far as I know.  Many, many threads have been made about this mod and its unavailability.

7 hours ago, lionbeast321 said:

ive heard that after spanner deleted all sm mods (except indistries) that a goo sum of people still have the mod sm marine. If so, can i get a copy? Never really experienced the mod as i never heard of  it until now..

No.  The mod is licensed "All Rights Reserved", which means you're allowed to download it from the author's posted location and nowhere else.  If he's taken that down, then that means you can't get it, sorry.

11 hours ago, Snark said:

No.  The mod is licensed "All Rights Reserved", which means you're allowed to download it from the author's posted location and nowhere else.  If he's taken that down, then that means you can't get it, sorry.

Yea that makes sense...ive always wanted to see sm marine and other interesting things he made, looks like theres no chance i will see it....oh well

Its honestly Too bad that he went as far as taking down ALL of the mods, couldve just left a download behind, or just couldve sold the rights, Oh well, guess ill wait till someone can make a mod that is Close to the SM mods
